concept.title: Resource Locking Custom Protocol Plugin Extension
concept.shortdesc: This plugin type allows the developer to work with a custom designed protocol for retrieving and storing files. It can lock a resource on opening it in . This type of plugin extends the custom protocol plugin type with resource locking support.

keywords.indexterm: Extend Oxygen with Pluginsimplement pluginresource locking custom protocol plugin

conbody.p: Such a plugin provides the following API:

li.p: The interface URLStreamHandlerWithLockPluginExtension - The plugin receives callbacks following the simple protocol for resource locking and unlocking imposed by .
There are two additional methods that must be implemented:

ul.li: getLockHandler() - Returns a LockHandler implementation class with the implementation of the lock specific methods from the plugin.
isSupported(String protocol) - Returns a boolean that is true if the plugin accepts to manage locking for a certain URL protocol scheme like ftp, http, https, or customName.
